module.name: HOGDetector
module.description: Detect objects from a video stream using a HOG descriptor

param.name: auto_process
param.description: If yes the module processes with a timer at fixed fps, if no the module processes based on the time stamp of the input stream

param.name: allow_unsync_input
param.description: If yes the module accepts that its input can be on a different time stamp. Only relevant if the module has many inputs. Use at your own risks.

param.name: class
param.description: Class of the module (define the module's function)

param.name: detection_fps
param.description: Frames per seconds for the asynchronous detection (normally smaller that module)

param.name: min_side
param.description: Minimum size of the detected object

param.name: scale_factor
param.description: Scale factor for scanning (higher: less sensitive)

param.name: object_label
param.description: Label to be applied to the objects detected by the cascade filter (e.g. face)
